com.cmput301w15t15.travelclaimsapp

Class GeoLocationController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cmput301w15t15.travelclaimsapp.GeoLocationController

  • public class GeoLocationController
extends Object
    Singleton class to track current location of device Also used for attaching GeoLocation to Destination and Expense and calculating distance from one GeoLocation to the users home GeoLocation

      • getDistanceFromHome

        public static double getDistanceFromHome(GeoLocation gl)
        Takes a GeoLocation and returns the distance IN KILOMETERS between that geolocation and the Users home GeoLocation
        Parameters:
        gl - GeoLocation to compare with home
        Returns:
        Distance between GeoLocations in kilometers

      • save

        public static void save()

      • setDestinationGeoLocation

        public static void setDestinationGeoLocation(Destination dest,
                                             double lat,
                                             double lng)
        Sets a Destination GeoLocation If dest's GeoLocation is null then a new GeoLocation is made and added to dest otherwise the dest's current GeoLocation Lat and Lng are updated
        Parameters:
        dest - Destination to update
        lat - Latitude to set
        lng - Longitude to set

      • setExpenseGeoLocation

        public static void setExpenseGeoLocation(Expense expense,
                                         double lat,
                                         double lng)
        Set a Expense GeoLocation If expense's GeoLocation is null then a new GeoLocation is made and add to expense otherwise the dest's current GeoLocation Lat and Lng are updated
        Parameters:
        expense - Expense to update
        lat - Latitude to set
        lng - Longitude to set

        Set a User GeoLocation If user's GeoLocation is null then a new GeoLocation is made and added to user otherwise user's GeoLocation lat and lng are updated
        Parameters:

        lat - Latitude to set
        lng - Longitude to set

      • pickLocationIntent

        public static Intent pickLocationIntent(Context context)
        Returns a Intent used for opening the MapActivity, when wanting to pick a location from the map
        Parameters:
        context - The context of the activity you call the function from
        Returns:
        A Intent that will open MapActivity in the select location mode

      • viewLocationIntent

        public static Intent viewLocationIntent(Context context,
                                        GeoLocation gl)
        Returns a Intent used for opening the MapActivity focused on a specific GeoLocation
        Parameters:
        context - The context of the activity you call the function from
        gl - The geolocation you wish to view when you start the MapActivity
        Returns:
        A Intent that will open the MapActivity for viewing the supplied GeoLocation

      • newUserLocationIntent

        public static Intent newUserLocationIntent(Context context)
        Returns a Intent used for opening the MapActivity when creating a new user
        Parameters:
        context - The context of the activity you call the function from
        Returns:
        A intent that will open MapActivity under new user conditions

      • getFirstDestinationColorCode

        public static int[] getFirstDestinationColorCode(Claim claim)
        Returns the color code and distance associated with the first destination with a GeoLocation Takes a Claim and finds its first destination with a GeoLocation attached and calculates the distance from the users home location. Then returns the color code associated with distance from home and distance calculated in int[]
        Parameters:
        claim - Claim to find destination color code for
        Returns:
        A int[] containing the color code and distance from home for the Claim

      • resetGeoLocationController

        public static void resetGeoLocationController()
        Sets the current location to null for signing out
